website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you like its design and features; otherwise consider others we reviewed.
pros: Boasts a stylish design and unique music center with nature sounds and a built-in nightlight
cons: Its design is a bit bulky, and it's not as portable as others we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib!! It was a little difficult to set up only because there are a lot of pieces to it. It took about 20 min to put together. We're using this as our baby's main crib until he gets a little older. I also love all the pockets and sound machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at my house for when my niece sleeps over and it was easy to assemble but when I went to fold it up to put away just recently ( it's been set up in my room since I bought it) I notice two of the bottomed supports are not attached to the main structure. They are not broken just looks like they were never put on the post. Not sure how much longer it will hold her weight. Not sure what to do about it at this point I bought it in Feb. She is too little to jump in it so again I just think it was not fully assembled right at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly, I am surprised at the size/quality of this Nursery Center/portable crib!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a baby shower gift, I must say I was impressed with the quality, and size!!! Mom-to-be loved it, she expressed sentiments in the ease of assembling, breaking down for travel, the little music center (stole her heart), and the different methods of use, which are all as described (bassinet, play pen, changing table, etc). This is truly a nursery center all in one. Highly recommend and all services were great from purchase through delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Was not used much, was difficult to get the sides to “lock into place”. Unfortunately one of the sides broke trying to get it to lock and it is now worthless. It’s a beautiful nursery center but not something I would recommend and it is now beyond the return time frame. This was Purchased to be used while babysitting our grandson which did not happen with the COVID-19 virus. Went to put it up today and that’s when it was discovered.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sosalski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter has a Graco pack n play at her home so I decided to buy this one particularly because the brown matches my decor 😂 (brown/beige). I felt like I needed it so I didn't have to u pack her pack n play everytime I take the Grandbaby. It can be a pain to put the sides up because I put here's together I already knew what to do Beautiful color Quality and material No odor All pieces were packaged Quick delivery, nothing damaged Everyone complains about the mattress however it's the mattress that they provide to protect your child from SIDS. If you want add a topper. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Godivacoco

customer_reviews.title: CHECK YOUR PRODUCT PIECES
customer_reviews.text: Rating is for the picture I listed above. There is some kind of industrial tape/ adhesive on the mattress pad. If my baby wasn’t due in less than a month I’d return and get it replaced.. super upset because I don’t have time to replace it and I’ll now have to constantly keep that covered so that it doesn’t get on my son. PLEASE CHECK ALL YOUR PRODUCT PIECES BEFORE ASSEMBLY. Otherwise it’s sturdy, attractive, and convinient. Seems I am just the unlucky one here.
customer_reviews.author: BlameItOnLarry

customer_reviews.title: BEST PACK-N-PLAY EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST PACK-N-PLAY EVER!!!! Easy to assemble, easy to break down. comes with a travel bag! It's beautiful and compact. You can easily put a crib mattress in it as well. I can't wait for my little one to be here, so they can enjoy it as much as I am. NO CHEMICAL SMELL. No broken parts, no dirty parts. Everything feels very secure including the bassinet attachment. The mattress it comes with is firm, just like it should be, but not too firm. It's a beautiful piece of furniture, and if I have another little one, I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This play yard is made very sturdy & of great quality. It was purchased as a baby shower gift for a first time mom. We all know most first time moms will more than likely eventually have a second child & those who have already had children tend to look for things that will last through more than one child for many years to come when purchasing a gift for a baby. I will absolutely order this again when its time to welcome another tiny miracle into our lives...
customer_reviews.author: Anna Franks

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to snap. Needs a better mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Pros:Looks amazing, easy to carry. It really does look great if you plan on keeping it in one room. Cons: Nearly impossible to SET-UP with the snap-joints being so snug within the fabric. I lift a good amount of weights in the gym and still have to have my husband help me snap the final wall into place. Very frustrating if you are planning on moving it a lot. 2. The MATTRESS that comes with the bed SINKS into the middle. Once a child is up to 15lbs the bed literally sinks in the middle and comes up on the ends, yes even when the VERY thin mattress is secured.
customer_reviews.author: MrsPrimo

customer_reviews.title: The canopy and changing station sux
customer_reviews.text: The changing station is not useful. When i put my 6 pound newborn on it, it slopes down and he almost rolled off it. Not safe! The canopy is not useful either. It's very flimsy and doesn't fit it well. I'm afraid it will come undone and smother my baby. I don't have either one of them connected to the main part anymore. The play yard itself is ok but I bought a play yard mattress to go in it because the pad that comes with it is pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: All the bells and whistles with low cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a great playpen. The neutral colors worked in both our living room and the bedroom. I like the bassinet insert that brought the baby higher up when she was little. She slept comfortably in this playpen up until the recommended age to remove the bassinet. When we removed the bassinet, we got a mattress which fit perfectly snug in the playpen, but I wasn't able to lower her in without waking her. I liked the canopy with the animals that kept her attention and the vibration really helped to keep her asleep. The pockets were convenient for storage. I didn't really use the changing table part much because while I'm only 5'7", it felt too low.
customer_reviews.author: T.  Scott

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews carefully. I think the bad reviews are from people with very high expectations. This is sturdier than other large name brand company's and attractive enough to keep in our living room. Not as easy to assemble as other brands but I still appreciate it, it's not so bad. In hindsight I would have not bought a bassinet and just used this.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: Fast delete. Set up was easy my kids even helped. Comes with a bag to put it if you need to take it to travel. I recently broke it down and put it in the bag for a trip and it was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: allye

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, sturdyamd stylish
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time my grandbaby comes over. I love the swinging changing table and organizer too. This was a good value. Well made and sturdy. Its not easy to take down and set back up, especially with the extra features, so I leave it up all the time. We get a lot of use from it. I like the look and color also. All in all, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE this! I recently tried a pack and play with a newborn napping station and hated it. It will only be used for a very short time and is a waste of money. I really like that this has the canopy to darken the bed.
customer_reviews.author: m2b2foster

customer_reviews.title: Other than that a great play pin
customer_reviews.text: Changing table is not fully straight so the baby slides down to the front of it when you place the baby in it. Other than that a great play pin.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Medrano

customer_reviews.title: River to changing station security snapped off first day.
customer_reviews.text: The diaper changing stations snap, securing to the pack n play, broke the first day. The rivet actually snapped in half. My newborn, premature grandson was on the diaper changing station at the time. He definitely was not over the expected weight limit. Although he was not harmed in any way, I felt the company should be made aware. I also think they should offer a solution or at the very least respond. I emailed the company asking for suggestions on fixing the problem. I have not received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best playard with good pockets and changing area
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase! It has a good canopy for baby in the morning and even at night, when he wants to sleep yet to early for grownups to dim down the lights. Playard is light, and easy to maneuver. We love the movable changing area, beats all playard that graco and chicco have. You gotta need a changing area that goes away when you don't need it. Also love the big pouch that serves my baby's own laundry bag. Plus the diaper pockets for easy access to diapers and wipes. You get waaaay more than you pay for with this playard.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 2nd purchase for this pack-n-play. I bought it to use for my house, then my son & wife took it. Now we have baby no.2 & I'm buying AGAIN for my House. I've looked at several, and you can't beat the Price for the features. Very Pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: John D. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Vibration feature went out in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The vibration has already went out. I only turned it on a 2 or 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Star Anna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our newest addition. We looked at not only the price but also the features. I love the flip changing table and the storage shelf for diapers and wipes. The canopy is definite a plus and the vibration is a life saver. Only down fall is that some of the pieces were very difficult to lock down on the sides. At the same time if they had been easy to lock I might have worried about stability. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Hole already
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this before the baby came I thought it was great. Now that baby is here and we have used it for a whole 4 days there is already a big hole in the cover for the bassinet. I was hoping this would last for at least another baby. Unfortunately this isn’t something that can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Cait C

customer_reviews.title: If purchasing this item and not assembling it right away check as soon as you receive it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson will be born May 20th, 2020 My daughter and I started putting his nursery set together, just to notice the pad is completely ripped i bought it at a good price and I also chose for it to be brand new. The bar also will not lock I know you have to push the middle down then pull each side but one bar is defected. This upsets me because he will be born in 1 week it took almost a month to receive. Amazon has lost some customers today due to this which could of been prevented if it were checked thoroughly. Now I have to find another nursery center elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Its infant and  toddler safe
customer_reviews.text: I love love this product you do not need a crib or playpen this come s with it all and its completly baby safe my baby loves it i would definatly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jclassy

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the vibrator part leaked this orange fluid all over the pack n play and my daughter got ir on her had to call posion control
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Decent, needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: Side bucket is too small for plastic pampers bucket. Diaper sack too big for small diapers so they just fall out. Changing table doesn't come off for cleaning, babys have blowouts so this is essential. The attachment for vibration and music cant stay on all the time, it hits the changing station and/or canopy
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playard and bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I still have about 4 weeks till my son is here but so far i LOVE it so far, love that it has the canopy to block the wind from the ceiling fan. I seen comments complaining that the changing area isn’t sturdy and the baby rolls but mine is sturdy and will be fine the three/four months my son will use it. The storage compartments are gonna be a huge help. I also purchased a portable crib mattress To go on the bassinet so it’s more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and practical
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the grandbaby. He just started using it at 9 months. He loves it and can be free inside and still see. He loves to bounce in it. He can pull himself up and it still hold his weight. He falls back in it and loves the light and music box area. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: vette2375

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care for the color and it was difficult putting together. The shade still doesn't go on and I've had it for quite some time. I would recommend a mattress pad as well. Other then that it's a nice pack and play. If I could use the shade o would because it's a great idea and the changing table goes up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome I love it. It has everything you could need for a complete nursery. I use it on the main floor in my livingroom and my baby spends a lot of time in it. My only complaint is that it seems like it was in the box for a very long time. The "mattress" part if this is actually thicker and more cushioned than most olay pens but there were some flat indentations on the cushion where it was pressed by something in the box :( aside from that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: ramon

customer_reviews.title: Love this pack n' play
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack n' play! I got an open box deal, so I'm that much more in love with it. My only complaint is that that I wish it fit easily through doorways. But, this one is particular is all high quality material and seems very sturdy. We have yet to use it with our baby (he's not here yet!), but I don't foresee any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Functional, affordable, storage space, gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: Functionality is phenomenal. Storage is unmatched. The price is totally worth it. Like other reviews mentioned the hood sometimes does not stay open, but a quick fix and it will stay. Put this on baby registry it will cost even less.
customer_reviews.author: Jerica

customer_reviews.title: Finished product is good, difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to put this together. The instructions were pretty much useless and I had to look up pictures to get it assembled. It was heavy packaged but not too bad put together. I like the finished product but I wish I'd shopped around more before buying this. I would have went with a different pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Powers

customer_reviews.title: Definitely useful and handy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really quite the nursery center. My daughter got it for her baby and I was impressed by all of the attachments and the versatile configurations. It's an all-in-one system for your infant.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moses

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set up. So difficult to put together and my son and husband put a lot together and they struggled. There is no way I could have put this together myself. Great price for what you get and I love the giraffes 🦒
customer_reviews.author: heather brown

customer_reviews.title: love it! compact enough yet is great for nap ...
customer_reviews.text: love it! compact enough yet is great for nap time at grandma's house. I ordered the mattress for that size since it will definitely need it in order for her to take naps. if you are looking for a perfect mattress than you should definitely invest in Dream On Me5" Inner Spring Play Yard Mattress, White/Blue fits perfectly snug in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this over more expensive units
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could be a little clearer to put it together, but other then that a great play yard at a even better price! Seems to be well made. We are still waiting on our new arrival, so I can't completely issue a thorough review, but just based on feeling the material and putting it together, I feel confident we made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at my home when my granddaughter comes to visit. I needed something that could fit in the corner of my bedroom and this fit the bill. It's heavier and more durable than a regular playyard/playpen. My son put it together in about 15-20 minutes. I like that it has two pockets on the side and that they can be moved to the other side if necessary. I also love that it has a built in bassinet feature to use for newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This pack n play is adorable. It has many features that I love. I purchased this for my Grand Baby. I also ordered a mattress and it is so cozy. I love the brown, taupe colors. This play yard is just as sweet as she is.
customer_reviews.author: Topgunn

customer_reviews.title: Very convinient
customer_reviews.text: I was given this for my 6th baby he is now 2.5 months. its very convinient especially the changing table and the diapers storage and very accesible especially at night time. Very very happy with this. The only thing i noticed is that its not to sturdy its a bit wobbly. But i am still very happy with the play pen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like the picture. Youll love it in your home
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love the neutral color/goes great with my room decor. My son is 8months now went from laying on the top to now laying and playing in the bottom half. Awesome storage space for diapers, wipes and lotions, medications etc. The only con I have is that it is hard to snap into place while assembling. I folded it up to take with me to am even and took 20 minutes to get the sides to snap into place.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandma’s House
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. Great value. I am a Grandma, so I keep it set up in baby’s room. Initial assembly was a little tricky, but overall not bad. She loves the vibration and sounds, too. Very compact and sturdy. Plenty of storage for all of baby’s things. Keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that my daughter didn't have to pack a bunch of stuff when her and the baby came out. It works as a bassinet, changing table, playpen and storage. The quality is great, the color is neutral and the convenience is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Value and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Slight struggle to get the sides to lock but once they were locked it is very durable and handy. Lots of storage for diapers, wipes, and extra clothes. Mobile is great, music attachment and the bassinet is easy on the back. Bought the mattress pad -an extra cost but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Sumrall

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for friend. It is way better than I expected it to be. So much has changed since I had kids.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the $
customer_reviews.text: This playpen has been pretty good so far. The durability and sturdiness seems to be great and I have dropped some heavy bags into this thing to include the car seat. It is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun K. Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Its alright when/if your ever get the thing assembled. Then you pack it up and try to use it again in 2 months after you forgot how the thing works and its hell all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice material and style
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to assemble, but not extremely difficult either. It does not break down like it's supposed to so you can use it as a pack and play. It's more like unpack and stay.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Product not worth the price and is not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The product was not easy to assemble. There was not one part that fit with ease. The plastic pieces did not fit in their spaces and cheaper quality than what you would expect with the price. The music box is horrible, crackles like an old radio.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Bagy Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review after the 11th of August. This is a baby shower gift for my niece. Will return with a review after that date.
customer_reviews.author: Country Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful first home for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this playard! I am now a mother of 3 and one of my goals when searching for a playard was to find one that was neutral in color and blends with our bedroom (vain, I know). Our search was over when finding this! Beautiful fabric and has all the bells and whistles that the more expensive playards had (minus a newborn napper which they don't fit for long anyway). Can't wait for little man to come home now!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price but the instrustions and parts for assembly didn't match up. Making it extremely difficult to put together and usually I'm good at this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shanlowe

customer_reviews.title: Playpen
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped for. Ordered this in place of a crib for when my granddaughter is with me at my home. A good buy for the price. Also ordered a mattress as the mat does not provide enough support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Sade Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the canopy, sturdy and good quality. I do wish changing table was washable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful for mom and dad
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift. My daughter says she wishes she had this when she had her other children. Very useful. Has a lot to make it easy for mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. The bassinet feature is my favorite. To color pattern is very cute. And I like the little box that plays music and vibrates. Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This was very hard to put together and The music box that comes with it didn't work at all. I was disappointed with that. I hate buying things that are broken. Grrr
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Received a damaged item but it looks good.. Hard to put together.. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: It started out fantastic but the locking mechanisms eventually stopped working after a few months. We immediately replaced it and within a week the same thing happened. The sides just won’t lock into place no matter what we do!! It’s ridiculous. Otherwise this would’ve been the best product!
customer_reviews.author: erik vonhess

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: The actual playpen is easy to set up but if your using the accessories it’s not easy and kind of time assuming.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Minx

customer_reviews.title: I really like it though
customer_reviews.text: I was so very excoted for i was finally able to get my little man a mew pack n play. But the changing table button is broke im going to message the company hut it was disappointing. I really like it though. Hope i can get it resolved
customer_reviews.author: Lori h.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves for her first baby, at least that is what she tells me.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: You get so much for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I know people have said it's hard to figure out how to assemble but I didn't even use the instructions and had no problems putting it together. I love It! It's so cute! The flip away changing table is only one of the thing i love about it. I love all the extras! I will update my review after I start using it in around 2 weeks after I start keeping my granddaughter. As far as the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Still need a cushion mattress for the bassinet, just because I wanted a softer feeling for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I had my 10 and 13 year old put it together for me with a little help from me just the lock on the sides other than that they figure it out on their own
customer_reviews.author: Massyvang

customer_reviews.title: Material is super.
customer_reviews.text: Good colour, like how is fully compact. Changing pad, can be used as crib and playpen. Easy to move around with wheels, has a lock on the wheels which is great. Love how the sides has storage to put stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: Keston

customer_reviews.title: New baby
customer_reviews.text: As of now all is great. Granddaughter not due until May 21.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel  Dell Worsham

customer_reviews.title: A purchase you won't regret! :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac of play yards. Super easy to assemble, and all the features make for a complete nursery system. Can't wait to bring our little one home, and put her in this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: libby a

customer_reviews.title: 💛💛💛💛💛
customer_reviews.text: Baby 👶🏽 loves it I purchased for my grandson when he visits and I assembled it easily and its great Recommend this brand and portable crib.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D. Gunn-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color it matches his lion king decor. It’s easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JustUsX2Boxxers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  Love the changing table too
customer_reviews.text: Given to our kids as a gift and they love it for out new grand daughter. They especially love the changing table feature
customer_reviews.author: MuralsByAndrea

customer_reviews.title: The perfect item!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack and play, super cute and VERY durable! Good quality. A little difficult to put together the first time but there after pretty simple. Because there are so many accessories to the crib If using for pack n play be prepared to leave several pieces at home. If using for a crib you MUST be prepared to purchase a mattress, no child should sleep on the included pad daily as a bed, it’s too hard. Overall... luv, luv, luv this item.
customer_reviews.author: DeBose

customer_reviews.title: ☹
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter didn't open it till she was 6 months and it was broke
customer_reviews.author: JT Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two kids loved them easy to use and pack up
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but dont buy this if you want to take it down quickly or travel with. This is more of a once its up its up option
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the get go!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but sadly I couldn’t. Tried putting it together, but the latch that’s supposed to lock was broke. Returned and going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect, love the changing area built in and two levels the baby can be on....
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: this looks nice. but a little cheaper quality than the graco one that I have. I wouldn't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: tkam

customer_reviews.title: Love love this so cute the mat part where the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love this so cute the mat part where the baby lays on we cut a piece of foam from an bed sponge and just put it on top of it with his sheets to make it more comfy
customer_reviews.author: Vinisha P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with an upstairs
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this! Great for people with an upstairs, to use downstairs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken parts
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this pack n play. I ordered it and kept it in the box until our baby came home, to keep it safe and clean. The day came for our baby to come home and i went to set it up, but found that it was broken on arrival. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wootersman

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, well made. It is as described, it is beautiful and functional. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Super all in one set up for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than the Graco versions I examined in stores. This is a great deal, super sturdy. We bought to use as an all in one in our 5th wheel.
customer_reviews.author: BrazeB

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel crib. My only complaint is that I wish the bassinet like cover/shade was actually a rounded shape. No matter how you work with it is it's angled, not rounded.
customer_reviews.author: Imadreamer64

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors. Easy to use for a.nana .love that it can easily b repaired with pink for girls or blues for boys
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Playpen
customer_reviews.text: Clean and just right of my 4 month old to roll around in
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bohanan

customer_reviews.title: Glad we picked this one
customer_reviews.text: We don’t intend for it to be mobile so it’s great, the changing station is very nice this is perfect for Our new born.
customer_reviews.author: Alban

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This little crib is awesome. Has everything you could want or need
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Baby Trend Deluxe Nursery Center, Haven Wood
customer_reviews.text: item is as pictured. love all the different features. There was a small hole in a seam on the changing table, but nothing a needle and thread couldn't fix.
customer_reviews.author: amy c cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift:)
customer_reviews.text: Look great. Best gift I gave someone. They love it:)
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get all together
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to difficulty putting it together..... I felt silly not being able to set everything up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My first baby item. It’s nice and sturdy. Wish it was a little taller but still cool. Assembled quickly. Love it, Wife loves it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, a little hard to put together though!
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute, and has lots of cool qualities! It is a little difficult to put together, you have to use all of your might it seems to push things together, but besides that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened box its a gift for a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: cruter

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The changing pad and bassinet combo are perfect or our newborn. The only thing we would change is the bassinet cover clicks when you slide it up so there is a risk it will wake a sleeping baby. Other than that, this is an overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Fetima Colter

customer_reviews.title: Lots of functions
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and many uses. Don’t like that you can’t use all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way except that it seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great in every way except that it seems to be slightly unlevel. Easy enough to fix and not such a big difference that the baby rolls to one side
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. They delivered perfect all around with this product. It looks exactly as displayed, it looks expensive and blends well with most colors.
customer_reviews.author: courtney smith

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Needs mattress it is not included, sound attachment needs 4 AA batteries not included. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tresey

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: the canopy was hard to fit on the rails. i almost thought it didn't fit, but after forcing it in, it popped in. other than that, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: lucid

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and daughter in law. They put it together and loved it. Easy to put up and take down. Lots of room and storage. Very study
customer_reviews.author: K Bennett

product_meta.title: Baby Trend Deluxe Nursery Center, Haven Wood
product_meta.description: The Baby Trend Deluxe Nursery Center - Haven wood; This feature rich Deluxe Nursery Center keeps your baby comfortable and entertained whether used in the home or on the go! Additional FEATURES include: Removable full bassinet and canopy, Flip away changing table, One-hand locking mechanism, Parent organizer, Toy/storage pocket, Large wheels with brakes, Travel/storage tote bag, Easy compact fold, Electronic music center with volume control, and nightlight, and Music center includes two styles of music, nature sounds. 39.75"W x 28"L x 32"H.
feature_bullets: Removable full bassinet and canopy, lots of storage
Flip away changing table. One hand-locking mechanism.
Music center includes two styles of music, nature sounds. Easy compact fold, travel bag
One-hand locking mechanism, large wheels for easy maneuvering with brakes
Recommended use: Play yard: Birth to 30 pounds or 35 inches. Bassinet/Changing Table: Birth to 4 months, weight: up to 15 pounds height: up to 25 inches whichever comes first
Care: Use only household mild soap and warm water. Do Not Use Bleach. Do Not Machine Wash.
